title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception: planting an idea into someone's mind.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
